voidReaverMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
voidReaverMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

voidReaverMod:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
voidReaverMod:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
voidReaverMod:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

voidReaverMod:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
voidReaverMod:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

voidReaverMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
voidReaverMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !voidReaverMod:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

voidReaverMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSk.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
voidReaverMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSk.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !voidReaverMod:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
